info.title: JSON-RPC NodeChain API
info.description: Docs relating to the JSON-RPC API, including the connection to the APIs of the native nodes of each blockchain. Its goal is to give the user an easy way to be able to raise their own nodes for use with the native Swapper application.

post.summary: Estimate fee by confirmations
post.description: Estimates the approximate fee per kilobyte needed for a transaction to begin confirmation within "confirmations" blocks if possible and return the number of blocks for which the estimate is valid.

post.summary: Generates and returns an estimate of how much gas is necessary to allow the transaction to complete
post.description: The transaction will not be added to the blockchain. Note that the estimate may be significantly more than the amount of gas actually used by the transaction, for a variety of reasons including EVM mechanics and node performance.

post.summary: Returns raw schema of any transaction

post.summary: Returns if blockchain is syncing
post.description: Returns True if blocks are syncing and returns False if theres no synchronization or is fully sychronize

syncing.description: False if not syncing or fully synchronized

currentBlock.description: Latest synchronized block index in the node

from.description: The address the transaction is sent from.

to.description: The address the transaction is directed to.

gas.description: Integer of the gas provided for the transaction execution. (Hex)

gasPrice.description: Integer of the gasPrice used for each paid gas (Hex)

value.description: Integer of the value sent with this transaction (Hex)

data.description: Hash of the method signature and encoded parameters

blockHash.description: hash of the block where this transaction was in.

blockNumber.description: block number where this transaction was in (Hex)

gasPrice.description: gas price provided by the sender in Wei (Hex)

input.description: the data send along with the transaction

nonce.description: the number of transactions made by the sender prior to this one (Hex)

transactionIndex.description: integer of the transactions index position in the block (Hex)

number.description: Block number or null if pending

hash.description: Block hash or null if pending

nonce.description: Proof-of-work hash or null if pending

sha3Uncles.description: SHA3 of the uncles data in this block

logsBloom.description: Logs bloom filter or null if pending

transactionsRoot.description: Root og this block's transaction trie

stateRoot.description: Root of this block's final state trie

receiptsRoot.description: Root of this block's receipts trie

miner.description: Address that received this block's mining rewards

totalDifficulty.description: Total difficulty of the chain until this block

extraData.description: Extra data field of this block

size.description: Size of this block in bytes

gasLimit.description: Maximun gas allowed in this block

gasUsed.description: Total used fas by all transactions in this block

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp of when this block was colated

blockHash.description: hash of the block where this transaction was in.

blockNumber.description: block number where this transaction was in (Hex)

gasPrice.description: gas price provided by the sender in Wei (Hex)

input.description: the data send along with the transaction

nonce.description: the number of transactions made by the sender prior to this one (Hex)

transactionIndex.description: integer of the transactions index position in the block (Hex)

blockHash.description: Hash of block containing this transaction or null if pending

blockNumber.description: Number of block containing this transaction or null if pending

gasPrice.description: Price in Wei of each gas used (Hex)

input.description: Contract code or a hashed method call

to.description: Transaction recipient or null if deploying a contract

transactionIndex.description: Index of this transaction in the block or null if pending (Hex)

blockHash.description: hash of the block where this transaction was in.

blockNumber.description: block number where this transaction was in (Hex)

cumulativeGasUsed.description: The total amount of gas used when this transaction was executed in the block

gasUsed.description: The amount of gas used by this specific transaction alone

contractAddress.description: The contract address created, if the transaction was a contract creation, otherwise null

logs.description: Array of log objects, which this transaction generated

address.description: address from which this log originated.

blockHash.description: hash of the block where this log was in. null when its pending. null when its pending log

blockNumber.description: the block number where this log was in. null when its pending. null when its pending log.

logIndex.description: integer of the log index position in the block. null when its pending log.

removed.description: true when the log was removed, due to a chain reorganization. false if its a valid log.

data.description: contains one or more 32 Bytes non-indexed arguments of the log

topics.description: Array of 0 to 4 32 Bytes DATA of indexed log arguments

transactionHash.description: hash of the transactions this log was created from. null when its pending log.

transactionIndex.description: integer of the transactions index position log was created from. null when its pending log

logsBloom.description: Bloom filter for light clients to quickly retrieve related logs
